flawed_nl_solution:
November has 30 days, December has 31 days, January has 31 days and February has 28 days for a total of 30+31+31+28 = <<30+31+31+28=120>>120 days
He burns 5 pieces of wood every day so 120*5 = <<120*5=6000>>6000 pieces of wood
Every tree he cuts down supplies 75 pieces of firewood and he will burn 6000 pieces so he needs 6000/75 = <<6000/75=80>>80 trees
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 6000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
